summary: The Technology Modernization Fund awards federal agencies funds to replace aging IT systems. Since the program's creation, Congress has appropriated over $1.1 billion and the Office of Management and Budget and the General Services Administration have awarded funds to more than 20 federal IT modernization projects. title: Technology Modernization Fund: Past Awards Highlight Need for Continued Scrutiny of Agency Proposals
